name: You Can't Do It: A Loan
name_original: You Can't Do It: A Loan
description:
Cole Moneymaker took out a big loan to get through mining college, and he needs your help to pay it back. Can you do it? A loan?

Try and climb your way out of a bottomless pit of student debt in this infinite-climbing action platformer!

Move Cole with "WASD" or arrow keys. Make regular payments to keep the bank off your back. See if you can manage to get 16 tons of coal and make it through the day.

Made in 48 hours and submitted to Bonfire Jam 2020

Art by Eric Benedict
Sound effects by Dr. Michael Kornblatt
 16 Tons written by Merle Travis, performed by Dr. Michael Kornblatt
Programming by Michael The Benedict and Adam Pendleton
Directed by Adam Pendleton
